          <title>
            <string language="sl">Žoga zdrsne v posodo brez  trenja</string>
            <string language="en">Ball Slides in a Bowl Without Friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugel schiebt in eine Schüssel ohne Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La boule glisse dans une cuvette sans frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A esfera desliza em uma bacia sem fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sfera fa scorrere in una ciotola senza attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφικές διαφάνειες σφαιρών σε ένα κύπελλο χωρίς
τριβή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La bola resbala en un tazón de fuente sin la 
fricción</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kroglo spustimo v posodo z vrha.</string>
            <string language="en">Ball is dropped into the bowl from the top.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">energija</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugel wird in die Schüssel von der Oberseite 
fallengelassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La boule est lâchée dans la cuvette du dessus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A esfera é deixada cair na bacia do alto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sfera è caduta nella ciotola dalla parte 
superiore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τη σφαίρα πέφτουν στο κύπελλο από την κορυφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La bola se cae en el tazón de fuente de la tapa.</string>
          </description>
